confirmation.title: Account Confirmation
confirmation.subtitle: Thank you for completing your registration! Check your email and click on the confirmation link.
confirmation.emailSentTo: We have sent a confirmation to the following email:

step1.title: Identification
step1.subtitle: User ID
step1.description: This is the first step to verify your identity and create your citizen account.
step1.cedulaTooltip: To start the process of validating your identity, your ID number is required.

step2.title: Verification
step2.subtitle: Proof of Life
step2.description: Next, we will validate your identity through facial verification and a proof of life. Make sure to meet the following conditions:
step2.camera: Use a device with an integrated camera.
step2.face: Allow us to take captures of your face.

step3.title: Registration
step3.subtitle: User Account
step3.completeForm: To complete your registration, fill in the following fields:

stepper.back: Go back to the previous step

cedula.invalid: It appears you've entered an invalid ID number.
cedula.exists: This ID has already been registered.

password.validation: It appears an error has occurred while trying to validate your password, try again later.

registration.flow: Oops! An error has occurred, please try again later.

errors.unknown: An unexpected error occurred, please try again later.

liveness.noMatch: We couldn't validate your identity with the JCE. Try again or update your photo at the JCE.
liveness.lowConfidence: The proof of life was not successful. Check the instructions and try again.

recaptcha.issues: It appears reCaptcha has not correctly validated your request, refresh and try again
recaptcha.validation: We can't validate the security of your browser, check for pending updates or try with another device.

errors.createIdentity: An error occurred while trying to create the citizen account. Please try again later.

terms.check: To continue, you must read and accept the terms and privacy policies.

minSpecifications.heading: The camera does not meet the minimum specifications
minSpecifications.message: The camera must support a resolution of at least 320 * 240 and 15 frames per second.

notFound.heading: Camera not accessible
notFound.message: Check that the camera is connected and that camera permissions are enabled in the settings before trying again.

timeout.heading: Time is up
timeout.message: The face did not fill the oval within the time limit. Try again and fill the entire oval with your face in 7 seconds.

faceDistance.heading: Face movement detected
faceDistance.message: Avoid moving closer during the connection.

multipleFaces.heading: Multiple faces detected
multipleFaces.message: Only one face should be present in the oval.

client.heading: Client error
client.message: Verification failed due to a problem with the client

server.heading: Server issue
server.message: Verification cannot be completed due to a server issue.

landscape.heading: Landscape orientation not supported
landscape.message: Turn your device to portrait orientation.

error.portrait: Make sure your device remains in portrait orientation during the verification.

hints.moveFaceFrontOfCamera: Position your face in front of the camera
hints.tooManyFaces: Make sure only one face is in front of the camera
hints.canNotIdentify: We cannot identify your face in front of the camera

header.heading: Facial verification
header.body: You are now going to go through a facial verification process to prove you are a real person.

photosensitivyWarning.heading: Photosensitivity alert
photosensitivyWarning.body: This verification displays colored lights. Be careful if you are photosensitive.
photosensitivyWarning.info: A small percentage of people may experience epileptic seizures when exposed to colored lights. Be careful if you or someone in your family has an epileptic condition.

list.heading: Follow the instructions to complete the verification:
list.stepOne: When the oval appears, fill it with your face in 7 seconds.
list.stepTwo: Maximize the brightness of your screen.
list.stepThree: Make sure your face is not covered with sunglasses or a mask.
list.stepFour: Move to a well-lit place that is not exposed to direct sunlight.

goodFit.caption: Well fitted
goodFit.alt: Illustration of a person's face, fitting perfectly within an oval.

tooFar.caption: Too far
tooFar.alt: Illustration of a person's face inside an oval; there is space between the perimeter of the face and the limits of the oval.

registered.success: Your account has been successfully created!
registered.header: Thank you for completing our beta test!
registered.body: We want to express our deepest gratitude for your participation and dedication. Your feedback and experience are extremely valuable to us for improving our product and providing an exceptional experience to all citizens.

cedula.min: The ID number must contain at least 11 digits
cedula.max: The ID number must contain a maximum of 11 digits

warnings.breachedPassword: This password has been involved in data leaks, so it is not considered secure. We recommend choosing another password.
